title: The logic is incorrect when a filter is applied to the table layout
description: We have a dataset with 10 records (DataResultA). When a filter (FilterB) is added to the table, the actual result is based on DataResultA instead of DataResultB.
OB: When dragging the dataset to the layout and setting a filter (FilterB) on the table, the result of FilterB should be based on DataResultB.
EB: The logic is not correctly implemented when a filter is added to the table on the layout.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a report and add a new datasource and dataset.
2. Apply a filter (FilterA) to the dataset, resulting in 6 records (DataResultB).
3. Add a filter (FilterB) to the table.
